text: Ezɨ Siseran mɨkarzim bar an amɨrazɨ ana aremezɨ moghɨn akui. Ezɨ Jael dafarir vuemɨn averpenibar benibar suizir afughafuzir mamɨn suira, egha dafarir vuemɨn ingangarir gumazibar haman suiragha, bar aghumra Siseran amuda zui. An haman suiragha ghua afughafuzir kam isa Siseran dakurum gasaragha, afughafuzim gafuzɨ, a bar anemɨkɨragha nguazim giraghu. Ezɨ Sisera areme.
